      • ProcessLine_Order

        private void ProcessLine_Order(java.lang.String Orders)
        Parses the values,separated by commas,from the Orders file and stores them in the assigned variables. Then added as the values for the Order object through the Order constructor and added to the order list.
        Parameters:
        Orders - : The string that contain the list of orders from the Orders file

      • ProcessLine_Menu

        private void ProcessLine_Menu(java.lang.String inputLine)

        Parameters:
        inputLine - : The string that contain the list of menus from the Menu file

        item_quantity - : The Integer that contain the quantity of the item ordered by the user

        Orderfile - : The string that contain the list of orders from the Orders file
